summary: An American doctor travels to Ireland to study the Casey family after 38-year-old Conor suffers a stroke which changes his personality, leaving dynamo wife and mother Vanetia to run the show.
cast: Ciara Gallagher|Maxine Peake|Edward MacLiam|Will Forte|Ruth McCabe|Brendan Morris|Sharon Horgan|Michael Harding|Kelby Guilfoyle|Ri Galway|Clare Barrett|Tim Landers|Joseph M. Kelly|Diarmuid de Faoite
keywords: reference to doctor doolittle|birdfeeder|38 year old|american|stroke
title: Run & Jump
